Text: Complete? Really, so episodes 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and... 9?... and that's complete? Even ignoring that season 8 has 11 episodes, it's obvious one's missing even if all you can do is count.

@rechrdcrg - this is series 18, not 8. 18 has 7 episodes not including the India Special and the episode 9 in the listing is the "best of series 18" special. 

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_top_gear_episodes#Series_Eighteen

Episode 6 and 9 are MKV the rest are AVI and MP4
